Contradict fact: The claim that the image shows a village of shacks in Los Angeles in 2019 contradicts the fact that the image was actually taken in Paris, France in 2015.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by implying that the image represents the current state of Los Angeles, when in fact it does not.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misrepresenting the image as being from Los Angeles in 2019.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that the image is from Los Angeles in 2019.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the image accurately represents the current situation in Los Angeles, when it does not.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the image, such as its actual origin in Paris, France in 2015.
